description:
On the day of the first selection, Hino turns up dressed informally through her ignorance. Thankfully, Lili shows up in her dressing room and uses magic to provide her with a selection of dresses. However, during the performance, Hino`s accompanist ducks out, criticizing Hino`s lack of commitment to music practice. Tsukimori arrives at the scene and defends Hino, while her accompanist runs away crying...
Source: crunchyroll
